cmp: 历 (calendar, to experience/to undergo/to pass through/all/each/every/calendar)

exm.mng: lit. an old steed in the stable still aspires to gallop 1000 miles (idiom); fig. aged person with great aspirations
lit. an old steed in the stable still aspires to gallop 1000 miles (idiom); fig. old people may still cherish high aspirations
exm.pyn: lǎo jì fú lì , zhì zài qiān lǐ
